storyInfo: Savage has made a carrot pie feast, and invites everyone for a tasting.

attributes.content: Babel Interior, Rim Billiton PLC Branch Office at Babel
Savage, are you busy...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh? Amiya, you're early here today.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: There's no goods that need delivering today, and I've got nothing too urgent to deal with.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What's the matter, Amiya? Nothing on your plate today either?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Today, the Doctor, Kal'tsit, and Theresa went outside, and they wanted me to stay by myself in my room for now... and then they'd all come back at dinner.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I don't know what I should even do, alone in my room...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmmm—hm, so you decided to sneak out and look for me?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *Sigh*. That's just how adults are, always tormented by work they can't finish. Not to mention those three make everyone wonder how much of a tireless 'workaholic' someone can be...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Does everyone become like that after they grow up?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not really... some people are forced to be, but there are actual people who believe, from the bottom of their hearts, how diving all the way into work enriches their life.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What kind are you, then, Miss Savage?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Me, eh...? When I'm working, I do my part properly until I'm done. I guess I decently like it?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But I can relax right now, so of course it'd be even more fun to be with you!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: That's right, Amiya, why don't we take advantage of today to try and cook something?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Cook?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can learn to make your most favorite Rim Billiton foods, like... carrot pie! Don't you wanna see what it's like to make it?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Cooking and baking are the greatest pick-me-ups for loads of people, and you'd be hard-pressed to tear them from it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I get to make carrot pie with Savage...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mmhm, I want to make some!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Alright, then, let's make some together.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The Doctor mentioned loving it too when we tried some together, so let's make a pie for when the Doctor comes back, and all three of us can enjoy it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: That's wonderful...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good! We're settled, then.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Follow me, Amiya. The carrots I asked from a work friend are in the kitchen freezer, plus we've got cheese, and the fowl eggs should be in...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Miss Savage, I cracked the fowl eggs!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That quick? Lemme see...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Er.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: (How'd half the egg whites go missing...? And all the shells are broken in there, too...)
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Um, not... not too shabby. Let me just process it a bit more, and we can put them right in...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: D—Did I do bad...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wh-What do you mean? Haha. This is your first time cooking, Amiya. You're just not that used to it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Right, Amiya, could you wash the carrots for me? Mm-hm, the ones right there in the basket...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Aaah, you don't need to wash that many! Good, just like that...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hold on, you don't need your fingernails for carrots, you can just use a vegetable peeler... it's normal for them to be all bumpy. First time, after all.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's a bit hard, kneading dough. Just leave that to me...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: No, let me set the oven, yeah? That's a little much to ask for now...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Wait, Amiya, that's not how you clean up flour—
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... *cough*... Waah, Savage, help me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Pff... pff, haha...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Waaah, my eyes hurt...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry, let me wipe them off for you now... *cough*, kfah-*cough*, kah-haha...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Stop making fun of me!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not making fun of you! Pff... You're just being extra adorable right now, that's all, Amiya. Oh, man, I want a memento of this to keep forever.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But you've got the flour all over you, now. Let's take you to tidy up first, yeah...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: N-No, the pie's most important right now... it'll be awful if we can't finish it in time!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Savage, let's wait until we're done to tidy!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha, alright then. Amiya, come here, let me wipe your face off for you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Once we've got the pie done and in the oven, we'll go and have a good wash...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Phew. Not too bad, and not a moment to lose.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Look, three pies, baked in the nick of time.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mmhm, they smell so good...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now we just need to sprinkle a little sugar on top and keep them warm, and that's a job very well done for us.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Come to mention it... I remember the Doctor was fond of particular tastes when it came to food. Amiya, do you have any idea?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mmhm! I remember all the things the Doctor likes about food. And... I remember about all the food you like too, Savage.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's this, what's this? You've been remembering things about me this whole time?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hehe... because you've been so nice looking after me, and when I see you eating something you really like, I get really happy too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I want to remember about everything that makes you happy!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And also, I want to keep making all kinds of really nice food with you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, it... it'd be nice if we could stay together forever... just like the Doctor, I hope I can have fun with Savage forever...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: B-But, if you have work to do, then you should do it! I know work is very important...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll be with you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Really. It's okay, Amiya, we're already super, super good friends.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Cautus sisters should love each other and live together, helping each all the way. So...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But... Dr. Kal'tsit said, before long, Babel and Rim Billiton PLC are going to finish their cooperative project, and then Savage would...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You already know, huh?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Yes, it's true. After that, I'll probably be heading back to work in Rim Billiton for a while.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'm already an adult, so there are responsibilities I have to bear. Right now, Rim Billiton still has some things I need to finish.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But I'll come back to see you as soon as possible, Amiya. No matter how far apart we are, we're friends. So long as you need me to help, your big sis Savage'll come protect you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mmhm... I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right. Right, then, let's drop this subject. Who knows if Rim Billiton'll forget about me, and they won't call me back in, and I'll be stuck as an unemployed drifter...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Maybe, if you keep at your studies, Amiya, you'll be like a VIP in future, and you'll start your own big company, and then I'll be one of your employees, yeah?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Whuh? My own company...? Um, could I do that...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Start putting in the effort now, and you'll get the chance one day, guaranteed.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The Doctor, Kal'tsit, Theresa, they're all especially mighty people. Make sure you learn well from your teachers, Amiya.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Mmhm, I know. You're very mighty too, Savage. When you were in Rim Billiton—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No way, no way, I can't compare to those bunch...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You're a super mighty teacher to me, Savage! You can make really nice food for me, you do work really well, and you've told me so many stories from Rim Billiton...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also, I know, you like keeping me company... you look after me just like a real big sister would.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know it'll be very scary when you leave... but, cooking today made me really happy. Thanks to this memory, I won't be so scared in the future.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Same for me, Amiya. Coming to Babel, getting to see you all happy finding me for a chat, playing together, cooking... I've been so glad all this time.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: So, knowing we're about to part, I'm gonna be very sad too.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But, I won't ever let you look at me and worry.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Amiya, living upon this vast world, each of us has things we need to do.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You'll find your own direction, your own forward in the future, I promise. If we have the same beliefs... we'll definitely see each other again.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'll strive to move forward. Amiya, you too...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Grow up safe and sound.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: A normal, unremarkable day.
Amiya has sought you out surprisingly early, bringing up the Rim Billiton delicacies coming this noon with expectation in her voice.
Obviously, after the privilege of five healthy meals in a row, it's a very hard invitation to resist.
I've been looking forward to this 'banquet' for forever. Savage will meet almost any request I have, but it's cooking alone where she won't budge an inch.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No formal invitations until all the ingredients were completely ready. Not the slightest thing could be lacking.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Savage is especially considerate of you.

attributes.content: Hehe... she's always had me act like such a spoiled child towards her. Besides, Savage makes such tasty food.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, its taste might be on the tame side for some Operators, but it suits my palate very well. How do I put it? It has a flavor that brings back memories of the home you came from...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, but I'm sure you'll like it too, Doctor. After all...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not really! I just wanted to share this with you... Savage welcomes you as a special guest, too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've been friends with Savage since long, long ago, so I know the food she makes is going to be delicious!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: You say 'we'... Savage said she remembered me, but couldn't say much more.

attributes.content: It's true, she knew you then, and made you Rim Billiton delicacies many times before, too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No need to worry, Doctor. To me and Savage both, you're someone utterly dependable, and worthy of trust.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I expect she's looking forward to this meal as a gift for you too, Doctor, for meeting once again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She isn't just adept at food preparation, she's also very exact with raw ingredients too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm... but I have no idea why tinned carrots from Rim Billiton were so hard to buy this year. They were the most important ingredient...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It wasn't just rising prices. Procurement channels have dropped off, too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For Rim Billitonians, carrots are essentially a most beloved food, and demand far outstrips supply for them on the market. They get even scarcer when you want to order goods you can send to Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course, more places besides Rim Billiton grow carrots. There'll be all sorts of different varieties in places all unalike. But Savage said...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'If it's not Rim Billiton's sweet, crisp kind, it's not gonna do, Amiya. I'll have you tasting the delicacy from your memories, just you wait!'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Hearing that's making me drool, too.;Carrots have their own fierce pride, too.

attributes.content: Haha... I'm looking forward to it, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Savage and I haven't seen each other in so long.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But the fact she's still willing to treat me like she did in the past, that... really reassures me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Sit yourself... down!
Eep!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That voice came from the dining hall... did something happen to Savage in there?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Aaah—hmp! ...Delish! Thank you for the food, Savage!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: (Rapid chewing)
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Oh, fine, you're welcome.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Th-This pie tastes so... so professional.
attributes.name: April

attributes.content: Heh-heh... no surprises there, no surprises. There's no one out there who can brush off my handiwork.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: April, you want to try some of mine too? It's all the rage in Victorian eating right now, you just take anything and dump loaaads—and loads of ketchup on it!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: No! You've already used up two whole bottles on this! You can't even taste the original flavor anymore, you naughty little kid!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Heheh, how about you try my special portion then, Ayers? It's the taste of innovation!
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: I always abide by the original flavors. Eat your grotesquely revised pie yourself...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Huh? Don't be a bore, Ayers! Get a little more creativity in you.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: When we were in Victoria, every time we went to a restaurant, we'd see customers ordering a pie just like this, and then squeezing at least four ketchup packets onto it.
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: 'The healthiest part of the food's actually the complimentary ketchup sachets,' didn't they always say that at all the fast food places?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: You are not comparing Savage's pie to a fast food joint.
attributes.name: April

attributes.content: Everything about it's so perfect, from the heat control to the aroma...
attributes.name: April

attributes.content: I feel like it's been ages since I tried this flavor. It's a scent you'd get while running around outside... is it nostalgia, maybe...
attributes.name: April

attributes.content: Yeah? I think it's pretty good, right?
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: How is it you have no idea how to read the mood?
attributes.name: April

attributes.content: Leon's trying to say that as a Catastrophe Messenger, he's already used to a life of long spates without any Rim Billiton food available. Being too dependent on your home's dishes... makes it hard to carry on outside.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: That's right. By the way, let me tell you something cool, April, while we were traveling out there, we saw another way to eat pie, where you have to grab it with your hands, and then you jump into the air—
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Wagh! Careful, you're gonna drop it, you're gonna drop the pie...!
attributes.name: April

attributes.content: Hol—Hold on, other people are still working right now, settle down a little... Leonhardt, sit still!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Aw, okay...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: Excuse me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: April & Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Whoa, it's Amiya and the Doctor—
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: So you were all dining, then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, we weren't, this was, uh, Savage inviting us for a 'taste-of-home sampling party'...
attributes.name: Leonhardt

attributes.content: You've made such a mess of the dining hall. Sorry, Amiya, Doctor, I'll tidy it all up soon.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It's okay, we're here to sample Savage's culinary delicacies, too. Let's all clean up afterwards.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Egg on your face, Leon.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I thought it'd be fine to act a little cool with just us four... April, I'll show you that special eating method next time.
attributes.name: Leonhardt
